name: New Yankee 9: The Evil Spellbook
description:
Travel back to the days of King Arthur to defeat an evil spell book with plans to claim Camelot as its own!

You read that right: A malevolent book is ogling King Arthur's throne and has already set its dastardly plot in motion! When John and Mary arrive on the scene, they find the realm in desperate need of his sword and her magic.

Join this time-tripping couple as they embark on an adventure to stop the spell book and save the king and queen. Along the way, you'll make alliances with the Lady of the Lake, a greedy knight and a boisterous bard, and face formidable foes, like blade-wielding scrolls spawned by a Book of Monsters!

That might sound daunting, but fear not! Using the unique skills of each member of your crew, you can defeat each enemy and overcome every challenge! As you race to remove towering obstacles, gather abundant resources and restore razed villages, each step will bring you closer to victory.

Have you packed your passport to adventure? Then step through the Magic Mirror and prepare for an epic journey through time!

GAME FEATURES:
• 53 levels of challenging fun
• Bonus chapter with 17 levels
• Step-by-step strategy guide
• Hidden puzzle pieces to collect and assemble
• High-quality downloadable soundtrack
• Dazzling desktop wallpapers
• 17 character backstories
• Three addictive mini-games
• Vibrantly animated game worlds
• Expert, Normal and Relaxed modes
• Dozens of upgrades and achievements
